description: 共同科英文（二）課程為一學期兩學分課程，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣

Grading

Attendance and Participation 25%

□Punctual attendance and active participation in class are highly expected. 

#If you miss more than 4 sessions, you may fail this class. 

#If you have to miss a class, please email me in advance.

#If you are habitually late, points will be deducted.

Reading journal 10%

•  Typed/ Hand-written, double-spaced, hard copy, no more than 1 piece of paper.

•  Each journal should include:

a. Summary of section C and D

b.vocabulary and phrases (definition and example sentences, 5 items in total)

c. discussion: (Question + Group response), 1 paragraph

e. Any other reading notes that you want to include in this theme (e.g. quotes, reflection…)

Show and tell 10%: cultural exchange

Spelling bee 10%

Lexile Test 5%: \*請參閱各系英語畢業門檻 Lexile分數規定\* (沒有校門檻)

               \*個人目標: 比前學期進步 50 分

Quality talk 10%

Final Oral Test 20%

You are expected to read a passage fluently and answer questions based on the textbook.

Online reading 10%

Bonus 5% Participation in English activities on or off campus, including 3-minute Presentation Contest.
